title: as a Maokai main with over 800 games, HE NEEDS A REWORK.
body: this champ is completely broken. infinite sustain at top, no mana costs, 3 types of CC, retarded damage, retarded ratios, retarded scaling, his ult pretty much gives you 20% extra HP, the list of things broken about this champ goes on forever. Riot, please gut or rework this abomination, for the future of this games balance looks grim.
